title: $(k, a)$-generalized Fourier transform with negative $a$
abstract:
The $(k, a)$-generalized Fourier transform $\mathscr{F}_{k, a}$ introduced by
Ben Sa\"id--Kobayashi--{\O}rsted is a deformation family of the classical
Fourier transform $\mathscr{F}$ with the Dunkl parameter $k$ and the parameter
$a > 0$ that interpolates minimal representations of two different simple Lie
groups. In the present paper, we focus on the case $a < 0$. As a main result,
we find a unitary transform that intertwines the known case $a > 0$ and the new
case $a < 0$.
